data.prayer: Over 93.75 percent of the people of Fujian are far from Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Fujian, Taiwan
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Fujian words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 30 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Fujian, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 4,428 believers in Fujian, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Malay people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Fujian, Taiwan to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Fujian that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.section_summary:
the state of Fujian, Taiwan has a population of 133,500.

We estimate Fujian has 4,428 people who might know Jesus, 3,912 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 125,160 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 30 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Fujian to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...
